content: 5 5 5 5 cm less than the total desired length note total length should be approximately 1/2 less than the foot that will wear it toe you will no longer be working in pattern across the instep but will be working all sts in stockinette round 1 k to 3 sts before instep k2tog k2 ssk k to 3 sts before end of instep k2tog k2 ssk k to end of round 4 sts decreased round 2 knit repeat rounds 1 and 2 for 6 7 8 9 more times you now have 28 32 36 40 sts on your needles repeat round 1 for 3 3 4 4 times until you have 16 20 20 24 sts on your needles remove marker and knit the first 4 5 5 6 sts then arrange your stitches so that the first 8 10 10 12 sts are on one needle and the last 8 10 10 12 sts are on another needle graft toe closed with kitchener stitch see resources for a tutorial weave in all ends and wet block the sock to relax the stitches tillybuddy s cast-on a video tutorial on working tillybuddy s cast-on for 1x1 or 2x2 ribbing https //www youtube com/ watch v=wf8cy_djtri foot size chart a chart provided by the craft yarn council with average foot/sock sizes http //www craftyarncouncil com/footsize html resources kitchener stitch a photo tutorial on working kitchener stitch http //www knitty com/issuesummer04/feattheresasum04 html sock construction a photo tutorial on basic sock construction https //blog tincanknits com/2013/10/03/socks/ copyright lisa k ross 2016 paperdaisy1@gmail com paperdaisy1 on ravelry 3 http //www ravelry com/designers/lisa-k-ross
